website_summaries.verdict: A great product for hydrating skin and evening tone, but it may be too heavy for oily and acne-prone skin.
pros: Reduces redness and evens skin tone
cons: Some have said it doesn't absorb readily and leaves a residue on skin

customer_reviews.title: Half empty tube
customer_reviews.text: Decided to hold up the tube to my vanity mirror and saw that I received only half the amount of product lol. Too bad I tried it out before doing this. The cream/lotion was sealed and supposedly untampered with so I'm extremely confused and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ANL

customer_reviews.title: A nice, emollient (but not heavy) moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of this is good for normal or slightly oily skin. It's not occlusive on me, and I have not found it to cause break-outs on my skin. It seems to calm irritation somewhat after I apply a chemical exfoliant, and is a nice last layer to apply at night. I haven't used it in the daytime, but one absolutely could without feeling overly sticky or greasy. Have not noticed any fading with this. My skin is in pretty good shape, but I have been battling one small, light spot of hyperpigmentation for a while that OTC hydroquinones, kojic acid, alpha arbutin, or even Rx tretinoin cream has not faded.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing overnight mask!
customer_reviews.text: My Korean beauty product obsession continues with this amazing overnight mask. I love the feel of it when it goes on and in the morning my face really feels softer and more supple. I've always had really dry, sensitive skin and this is definitely one product I generally feel like it's working. My face looks and feels plumper when I wake up. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice mask to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I found this when I looked for a rice product, after learning the benefits of rice for the skin. Seems to hydrate well without heaviness or stickiness. I need heavier creams usually for my dry skin but I use this several times a week at night over my serums with good results. I have fairly sensitive skin and this doesn’t seems to aggravate it. I’m not sure about it’s anti-aging capabilities but it is a nice wholesome moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the product that got me hooked on cosRX
customer_reviews.text: This is a good moisturizer but I’d not consider it a sleeping pack or a mask not matter how much a slap on. It is a moisturizer and it doesn’t make my skin break out, look red or make my eyes water if I get it too close. Maybe if I had my old oily skin I could use this by itself but for my chemically dry skin I’m using this as my first moisturizer and laying other stuff on top. Definitely feel like I’m getting value for money but this is too basic of a product to swear by as the one true lotion. On the other hand basic doesn’t break me out, smell bad or break that bank.

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I use it as a last step to seal in my other products at night. I feel like this really makes a difference, because my face is noticeably calmer and less red the mornings after using this product. Sometimes I mix in a little bit of rosehip oil for extra moisture. It seems like this would be great for sensitive skin, as it has no scent!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Not to be dramatic, but I would die for this face mask!
customer_reviews.text: Thisssss masssssk honeyyyyy!!!!!!!!!!! I moved to California and the dry air sucks all of my expensive moisturizing products right off my face. I use this as a regular daily moisturizer mixed with foundation-- and as a sleep mask. My face is NOTICEABLY plumped out, happy, shiny, glowing. I wake up with the bounciest skin after using this. Get it! Hoard it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this overnight mask so much that I use it every night at the end of my skincare routine. It makes my skin bright and glowy and less red. I always wake up happy to see my skin. :) It also spreads extremely easily and dries decently quickly--at least I never worry about it getting on my pillow. I love that this contains niacinamide, which helps brighten and even out your skin tone, improve the appearance of large pores, and light dark spots and discoloration. It also has NO scent whatsoever so it's good for sensitive skin. I'm on my second bottle now and I will definitely be repurchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy skin
customer_reviews.text: This is odorless and non-greasy, and can be worn as sleep mask or a regular daytime moisturizer if you have dry skin. I have worn it under sunscreen and makeup, and it does not cause any pilling. The best part - It somehow makes my skin feel “bouncy”. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie1400

customer_reviews.title: The best...without the price tag
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite amazing. It makes you wake up with smoother, clearer, and firmer skin for the ingredients are great But this runs out fast. I have combination skin, I didn't find this product heavy or rich at all, therefore, it would be disappointing as a sleeping mask. Thus, I used this as an everyday moisturizer and it runs out quick. I was only able to use it for about 1.5 months. It's not bad but it's a bit costly. I can see this being more budget-friendly and effective if you use a lotion before this.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: I'm on my 3rd tube!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic if you have a skin care regimen with some pretty harsh products. Even though I use some pretty intense products to manage my oily, acne-prone skin, whenever I use this moisturizer, I wake up with skin supple and bright enough to make me audibly go "whoa" in the mirror every morning (and I literally have!). The products I use to control my acne could have made me red, dry, or irritated, but I have had no problems whatsoever when I pair them with this moisturizer! I am someone who loves shopping for and trying out new skin care products but I won't give any night-time moisturizer another look not that I found this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL
customer_reviews.text: still exploring skin care but the COSRX line keeps delivering consistent products at a great price point. I have combo skin and i really appreciate this moisturizer's versatility. For application i apply a majority of the product to the peripherals of my face as that is where the dryness is occuring. I've noticed that it helps address dryness, and helps my face look moisturized instead of overly dewy or possibly greasy. ive had sucesess with this as a daytime mask as well as overnight. my skin drinks its up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do much for me. :( I’m experimenting with the whole K-Beauty and other Asian skincare. This was recommended by the YouTuber, Gothamista. I’ve had a lot of luck with her recos. This one just didn’t seem to make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Violet

customer_reviews.title: Good product from a great line
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. It's a little tacky on the skin, even after it soaks in, but it seems to hydrate my skin and doesn't seem to break me out or cause me any irritation. I wear it overnight and wash it off in the morning. It's a good product but I have to say, I prefer their honey mask to this one, though I alternate using both.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this broke me out. After using it overnight, I woke up with small pimples all over my face and got worse 2-3 days after. I love the honey overnight mask than this one.
customer_reviews.author: deshycled

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Dr Dray gave a great review on the lotion/ mask so I thought I'd give it a try and I'm glad I did! It's not so much a mask but more of a lightweight lotion, and a little goes a long way. When applied it turns into gel that literally melts into your skin! (it's not sticky or tacky) It definitely has a lightening effect because the next morning my skin is much brighter and clearer, and baby-butt soft!
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: I don’t use this only as mask I use this as night deep moisture cream
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for at least 3 month... it’s very hydrating ... love that it observes fast , and most importantly I have sensitive skin it doesn’t break me out! I will be using this product o er and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Lena.F

customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin that's also sometimes dry. I apply it as a second Moisturizer before bed and it's awesome. It's helped heal my dry spots and makes my face feel very smooth. I've also been sick and blowing my nose, so the skin around my nose has been dry and irritated. However when I apply this product, it saved my skin from becoming red and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkole

customer_reviews.title: EVERY DAY EVERY DAY... I'm moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: One of my go to products. I love using this for an every day moisturizer. It's light and moisturizes my skin. It doesn't clog my pores so no breakouts. Also, I can wear make up on top of this. Definitely a must try if you have combination skin like me.
customer_reviews.author: Euphoria

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and eczema and have allergic reactions to most skin products. I have been using strictly oils for moisturizing for the past few years (argan, rosehip, jojoba), but I wanted to find other options. I have been using this nightly for a week straight with no allergic reactions. I wake up with my skin nice an moisturized! I've also noticed that my skin feels a lot softer throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Garner

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My skin has been sooo dry as of late. I needed something that would really moisturize and rehydrate my face. This stuff is great! It’s very mild for sensitive skin which I have. My skin feels so soft and moist since I’ve been using this. Also brightens my hyperpigmentation. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ginsburg

customer_reviews.title: Formulation is great; wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I will order this again. It doesn’t irritate my skin. I have sensitive skin: rosacea and no issues. I have oily skin in my t zone and acne in my mature years. This product helps with all of this and controls skin throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: AS2010

customer_reviews.title: Greasy, this cult favourite isn't for oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: I hate how greasy this is. However my scent hating friend loves this and swears by it. Probably better suited for skin that doesn't get oily.
customer_reviews.author: Suna Y

customer_reviews.title: Light and Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It is very moisturizing and there’s no need to use a lot. I wanted to use it for at least a week to give it a proper review. However, my skin routine consists of an oil cleanse, cerave cleanser, cantella toner, a hydrating probiotic spray, and this mask (at night) so it could be a combination of these items that contribute to my skin’s moisture level.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed — Came half filled
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product itself. It really helped to hydrate my skin. BUT like someone said, I think amazon is the WRONG place to buy this. I also got a half filled tube!!! I am disappointed! I don’t think it’s supposed to be like this if you buy it from an authentic korean website. Seems like the complaint for being half filled is only on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice texture.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice texture and goes a long way especially if used on freshly washed, warm, moist skin. It is very nice. I didn't give it a 5 because it doesn't moisturize my skin as much as I would have liked. It would be perfect for younger skin. It is not oily at all, and doesn't clog my pores.
customer_reviews.author: PYWB

customer_reviews.title: There is a very small amount of product in this tube
customer_reviews.text: So here are 2 product containers almost the same size. One says 100ml and another says 60ml. So you are actually buying less, you are buying 60ml in a huge, half empty tube. I used the flashlight so you can see. This is just a marketing trick. Be aware of it. But it’s very cheap, so not a big problem for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent Free and nongreasy
customer_reviews.text: This is gentle, light weight and moisturizing. I haven't used this as a mask, but don't need to apply it before bed every night, because the ultra moisture it offers is either a nice treat or a quick remedy for spot dryness. I would use this everyday if the tube wasn't so small
customer_reviews.author: RebekahRenee

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this product and the brand . I recently got into kbeauty and was looking for a good moisturizer. after doing my research i landed on this one and i think its a keeper. it not too heavy for my skin, has a big dose of niacinamide and does the job of moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Romesh

customer_reviews.title: one of my most favorite sleeping packs
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the end of my skincare routine. I have mild rosacea, and my skin is dry and dehydrated. This is great at moisturizing and soothing my skin especially after using actives. The next morning my skin feels so calm and smooth. I have purchased this at least 4 times and will repurchase again. Also, I am so happy this is now available in a tube rather than a jar.
customer_reviews.author: Hazeldazel

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out
customer_reviews.text: This broke me out, unfortunately. When I did use it, it was somewhat moisturizing, but perhaps not as much as I expected. I didn’t get to experience any longer term benefits because I had to discontinue use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have oily sensitive skin and have had zero issues using this product. I have been using it every night since I received it two weeks ago. It does what it says with minimal ingredients. I’ve recommended it to friends who purchased it and also love it. Highly recommend. Just want to add I actually PURCHASED this and used it. This was not sent to me!
customer_reviews.author: aimanb

customer_reviews.title: It does what a moisturizer is supposed to do and more
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was gonna have huge breakouts, because I have oily skin but it doesn't, it's not that creamy/thick/heavy, I feel like it's more water based. My face literally feels like a baby's bottom; it feels really nourished and hydrated :D
customer_reviews.author: Melina Zurita

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love sleeping masks/ packs and own many including the watermelon overnight sleeping mask and the Laneige water mask. I think this one is my favorite so far. My skin has been so unbelievably soft and smooth every time I have used it. I will definitely keep this one in stock at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mask
customer_reviews.text: This is unscented, and not sticky at all. It says it's an overnight mask, but it absorbs in very quickly, so I use it all day just as a supercharged alternative to my regular moisturizer. My husband uses this too. It's great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: k.bar

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very moisturizing cream. Recommend to use it only at night as a final product. The skin is soft and supple the next morning. Donot use it during the day time as it can make your skin a little greasy. Best suited for combination and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Niv

customer_reviews.title: Half Empty Tube
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I received this item today, everything looked great packaging wise. In box sealed in Cellophane. I was excited to try it. Opened it up and it didn’t seem full, I took the cap off and was more reassured with pulling off the seal. It wasn’t until I was in bed and looked over at my nightstand where it was sitting in front of my lamp that I could see it was half full!!! WTF 2.02 oz my foot. More like 1.01 So beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not holy grail.
customer_reviews.text: Came highly recommended by various kbeauty bloggers and Reddit. I thought it was okay but didn’t blow my socks off.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Made my face baby-butt soft
customer_reviews.text: Very light and nourishing! I like to use this as the last step in my night time routine, or a little mixed in with my regular moisturizer. I have only, dehydrated skin and this is not greasy or heavy at all. Smooth, dewy skin is finally a realistic goal for my skincare now.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin - Beware
customer_reviews.text: My skin was tingling at first. But then it started to itch on and off. Finally, I had to wash my face after a couple of hours because i could not take it anymore. It is too bad because I really wanted to enjoy it as well, especially since it was recommended by multiple people. Worst part it its not returnable. Now I dont know what to do with this brand new tube. So yeah, for those with sensitive skin, I'd think twice about this. Non-returnable products are just not worth the money or the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Lam L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this night mask. It has a nice texture and really makes my skin feel soft. I feel like it does a better job of sealing in moisture than other night masks I’ve tried. And it doesn’t irritate me skin at all. Skin type: oily/combo acne prone
customer_reviews.author: Jackalope

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and not moisturizing at all
customer_reviews.text: I read many positive reviews about this mask, so I decided to purchase it to brighten and moisturize my skin. However, when I applied it, this mask just stayed on my skin and didn't get absorbed well. Also, it started clogging my pores, so if you have acne prone skin, I really don't recommend it to you. Doesn't help you at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shu Lin

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite skincare products!
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this amazing product from Dr. Dray, a dermatologist who has a very popular YouTube channel. She recommended using this product after applying a humectant while your face is still wet from washing it. I also purchased the humectant she recommended, Pyunkang Yul Moisture Ample. Between putting that stuff and this rice lotion on my face immediately afterwards I no longer have dry skin. Check out her channel and buy this stuff because you'll love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Girls

customer_reviews.title: More like a lightweight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product overall but the name of a sleeping mask is misleading . It dries on the skin pretty quick after application, leaving the skin a bit moisturized but not enough to keep the skin hydrated throughout the night. Wouldn't recommend this "mask" for dry to normal skin, but it would work well for oily skin. You can also use this "mask" as a moisturizer in the morning , to keep the face hydrated ENOUGH for the day (lightweight moisturizer). It has good ingredients though .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great skin, recommend the toner too
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have noticed that since i started using it my skin tone has been a lot more even. I totally love it! I would recommend using it with the toner since that’s what I have been doing and seen the results with.
customer_reviews.author: Zaira

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This product is honestly so amazing! I wake up with such moisturized and plump skin. And since it has niacinamide, it just makes the product even better, since niacinamide has such amazing brightening benefits and is great for uneven skin tone!
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff so far! I have very dry skin and felt I needed something extra to lock in the moisture. I have tried other sleeping masks that are thicker and I would say I like the more but this one I can use during the day as well and I am not sticky or greasy! The smell is light and it goes on very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing enough for winter
customer_reviews.text: This absorbs really quickly and my face still feels tight and dry when I wake up. Not ideal for anyone with dry skin in a dry climate, but I would use if I lived somewhere humid.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes without being too thick
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for about 6 months now and really enjoy it! I have dry skin so I like piling on the moisture at night. It comes out way less thick than other nighttime moisturizers so I was skeptical at first if it was really going to hydrate my skin. I use just a dime sized amount for my whole face and it works! I like that my skin drinks it up and I’m not worried about half of it ending up on my pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No brightening effect
customer_reviews.text: this rice mask did not have any brightening effect as I expected. It is fragrance free and does feel nice on the skin but I would not recommend it if you're trying to get rid of hyperpigmentation. I mostly use it as a moisturizer now because it has a very silky feel but nothing too special
customer_reviews.author: Wawa

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this as a mask but I do use it as a night cream when my skin is being particularly sensitive. It’s super soothing and gentle which is just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kalie

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is the last moisturizer I use in my skin care routine, and it does a wonderful job locking in all moisture. Very gentle for sensitive skin, zero fragrance, and did not clog or irritate my skin. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have combo/ oily skin and this mask is such a blessing. I can't describe how good this mask is. I live in a very dry state and my skin gets very dehydrated causing it to make more oil. I put this mask all night and wake up with a glowing skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Eh... nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. I’ve tried a lot of Korean beauty products and I’m just not impressed by this one. It feels like a think moisturizer but I haven’t noticed much of a difference. I will be going back to using the Laniege water mask.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: A Go To
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the application and texture of this over the innisfree packs. No reactions for this formula thus far. I even use it during the day but it is important to layer up on sunscreen. I have normal to dry skin and it works well under concealer/foundation. Just remember to allow time for serum(s), oil(s), and occlusive(s) to absorb for like 10 minutes or so before makeup application. Especially, if you are using a beautyblender.
customer_reviews.author: Dolimai

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with great expectation but I was bot happy with this product. As I didn’t notice any great changes in my face after using this product .
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Great overnight cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is great. My skin has been super dry bc of the extremely cold weather and hot showers. I use this before bed within a week my skin was visibly softer.
customer_reviews.author: EFS

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy moisturizer for my dry skin. Only need a little every day. I used it continuously for about 3-4 months before I needed to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a skincare vlogger on Youtube. Immediately purchased it as I was told it is great for dry sensitive skin. I noticed results after the first night I used it. My skin was soft and plump and I noticed that my redness was reduced. Finally found my holy grail night cream!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Good daytime moisturizer for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: For dry skin it’s a very good daytime moisturizer or a light nighttime moisturizer. Not at all a miracle worker on dry skin. Sinks in pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Wyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive dehydrated skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this mask on nights when I’m not using my retinoid. I mix this mask with aquaphor and apply it to my entire face and I really like the combo. It’s very moisturizing and brightening. It has a fresh scent without having fragrance or essential oils. I also love the niacinamide in this because it helps restore the skin barrier and brighten as well as the rice extract which is brightening.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that mask at all. In my opinion it did NOT moisturize at all. There’s way better masks out there from k beauty for about same price.
customer_reviews.author: Fb1907pl

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sleeping mask
customer_reviews.text: This product is really moisturizing without being greasy. It makes my skin really soft, it is also really brightening and helps even out my old acne scars. This brand in general is a little more pricey, but is really high quality and worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product. I love that it has nothing extra like crazy perfumes or colors. I use this overnight on my dry skin and it is beautiful. Highly moisturizing but not heavy or greasy. I do not recommend for someone with an oily face, this is all moisture for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Such cooooling and hydrating relief!
customer_reviews.text: This works so great. I’m using it every few days to help with the Retin A/Tretinoin dryness. It’s very moisturizing and will leave you feeling hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Get jt
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, leaves my skin really soft, moisturized and looking great! It doesn’t have a scent and it’s great for sensitive skin. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Garett

customer_reviews.title: Skin dry in the morning
customer_reviews.text: Its very lightweight and hydrates a lot but skyn doesn't stay hydrated all night long. When i wake up my skin is super dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customers

customer_reviews.title: As a face mask - it doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it as a face mask and not a full overnight. I didn't feel any impact after washing my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Texture
customer_reviews.text: Dislike this "mask" it is not a mask, more like an extremely light-weight moisturizer that goes on to the face.
customer_reviews.author: Mocean

customer_reviews.title: It actually does brighten your skin
customer_reviews.text: It lightened my red acne marks the next day. There was no scent. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product can’t return :/
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the COSRX Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Mask (which I’ve used before and love) and received the COSRX Two in One Poreless Power Liquid? I’ve ordered from this seller before in the past without a problem, but this product isn’t eligible for replacement / returns so I wasn’t sure what to do lol
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this product! I have sensitive skin that prefers simple routines and this product works great as my moisturizer. It does also calm redness on my face when I use it overnight. It's a staple in my routine now.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: Good mask.
customer_reviews.text: My face skin is dry during the cold season, and this mask moisturizes well. I leave it for 30 minutes and wash it off with warm water. I recommend this face mask.
customer_reviews.author: Nilyu

customer_reviews.title: Nice overnight mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brightening mask and doesn't bother my ultra-sensitive skin! I'm thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Overall a very good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: There is a odd scent that might be unpleasant for some people, but other than that this moisturizer made my skin been sooo smooth and soft in the morning. It also helped with some of my hyperpigmentation and acne scars
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Mine came only half full and seal intact.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the comments I checked mine and it came with only half the bottle. I highly doubt I’ll purchase it again. I will resubmit my review after a month of using it. I’ll share my results then.
customer_reviews.author: Yax

customer_reviews.title: Best moisture!
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle and moisturizing. A little goes a long way. Definitely feel my skin being more hydrated throughout the night, and wake up to plump skin! I have oily/combo skin, and it didn’t make my skin too oily. For the whitening properties, my acne/scarring from acne did clear up faster while I was using it. Not sure about overall complexion whitening. I’d try it again to test that out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super hydrating after using my daily cleanser. My skin always looks so nice after a night of having it on. Very moisturizing, so you might not want to use it during the day unless you have dry patches or dry skin in general. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Used as part of the 10 step night routine
customer_reviews.text: Have used many of their products and this is one of the better CosRx products. Very moisturizing but does need to wash off in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Digging the Rice
customer_reviews.text: I really like many of the Cosrx products and this one is no exception. Good, thick moisterizer and skin brightener. I have dry and sensitive skin. I will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lippi

customer_reviews.title: Love it 💗
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and feels good for my dry skin!! Loving it. 🤗💗
customer_reviews.author: Bao

customer_reviews.title: Now a permanent part of my routine
customer_reviews.text: I love everything CosRX - great products, great prices, great results. This overnight mask is perfect for waking up with soft skin and not so thick that it can't be worn on cold winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nourshing and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing, nourshing, good for skin with minimum smell. The skin feels refreshed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Garima Garg

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Some breakout happened and I don’t know why didn’t suit on my combination skin. Half emptied bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Good for normal to slightly dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I like using this product at night as my last step of my skincare routine. It feels nice and moisturizing on the skin. There will be days that my skin feels more dry than usual and i do end up following with another heavier moisturizer on top. This product is good for people with normal to slightly dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend It To Everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my routine. Nice evening/overnight mask that is extremely hydrating, and bonus, it helps to lighten post hyperpigmentation. Will continue to repurchase and try other products in the line!
customer_reviews.author: Maune81

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin and very moisturising
customer_reviews.text: Great, love it! Was recommended by Dermo on YouTube. Contains niacinamides and can be used as just a moisturiser even under makeup. Doesn’t break you out and fragrance free. I have extremely sensitive skin (mainly to fragrance) and this is not irritating at all. Im a Flight attendant and wear this in crew rest on long haul flts.
customer_reviews.author: KGI

customer_reviews.title: amazing night cream!
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is great! it came sealed and while ive only been using it for a few days, i havent had any adverse reactions. it feels moisturizing and has a very very mild scent, not at all noticeable. ill come back in a month or so to review long term effects!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Larson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Non-greasy, but doesn't sink in immediately
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I've been looking for a good sleep mask & tried several. Combo skin, but I use a lot of acids so my skin needs moisture & protection. Glowy in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping mask is so soothing and has the perfect amount of moisture for my last skincare step at night. Works great even during the day under makeup on days where my skin in extra sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very mild moisturizer - not heavy like most overnight creams.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: So hydrating. Safe for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I see this for my long duration flight. And it worked like a charm. My skin was moisturised and hydrated for the 23 hour long journey. Will recommend it for sensitive skin too. Get it for long flights and treat your skin with hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Sonali

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY NOT RETURNAB
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE. Read ingredients.. a lot of fillers with clog poring oils.. this product is not returnable
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my overnight mask and it does wonders for my skin. Love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Rita Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight moisture
customer_reviews.text: This is good for those need lightweight moisture. I only use it as night cause it's nottoo heavily like other moisture. Overall not bad for the price, it does the job
customer_reviews.author: phung

customer_reviews.title: my skin felt amazing. Really hydrating
customer_reviews.text: In the winter my skin gets really dry and flaky, and after the first use, my skin felt amazing. Really hydrating! I Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Prjalkina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this night mask. I use it as a regular cream, day and night. Not oily. Little sticky but works as a great make up primer :D No smell so it is amazing. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Almedina Cho

customer_reviews.title: good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a moisturizer and it’s great - the only thing is my skin is extremely sensitive so it burns sometimes when I put it on. I haven’t had any breakouts or new skin problems since using it so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sadique

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I use it as a moisturizer and it leaves my skin so soft and smooth. It also helps with brightening my complexion which is always a good thin if you have uneven coloration. The cream isn't to thick, it's a nice consistency and very easy to use. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t moisturize at all
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this didn’t hydrate or moisturize my skin at all. I gave it 3 months to see if it made any difference. I put it on every night after a showered. I just sat on top of skin while it still was dry. Didn’t work for my skin type which is dry/oily.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hayes

product_meta.title: COSRX Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Spa Mask, 60ml / 2.02 fl.oz | Rice Extract 68% | Korean Skin Care, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
feature_bullets: TIP: As a 3-in-1 mask, this product can be used as an overnight mask, a cream or as a wash off mask!
